name: deployments
title: Deployments
description: Table with device deployments information. Includes `deploymentID`, start, end, location and device setup information.

fields.name: deploymentID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the deployment.

fields.name: locationID
fields.description: Unique code that refers unambiguously to a location record. One locationID per latitude-longitude pair.

fields.name: locationName
fields.description: Name assigned to the deployment location for easy reference.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the deployment location in decimal degrees (WGS84). Range: -90 to 90.

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the deployment location in decimal degrees (WGS84). Range: -180 to 180.

fields.name: coordinateUncertainty
fields.description: Horizontal distance from the given `latitude` and `longitude` describing the smallest circle containing the deployment location. Expressed in meters. Especially relevant when coordinates are rounded to protect sensitive species.

fields.name: deploymentStart
fields.description: Date and time at which the deployment was started. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: deploymentEnd
fields.description: Date and time at which the deployment was ended. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: setupBy
fields.description: Name or identifier of the individual or organization responsible for deploying the recorder.

fields.name: recorderID
fields.description: Identifier of the recorder used for the deployment (e.g. the serial number of the recorder).

fields.name: recorderModel
fields.description: Manufacturer and model of the recorder. Formatted as `manufacturer-model`.

fields.name: recorderConfiguration
fields.description: Detailed settings used for data collection (e.g., microphone type, recording schedule).

fields.name: recorderHeight
fields.description: Height at which the recorder was deployed. Expressed in meters. Not to be combined with `recorderDepth`.

fields.name: recorderDepth
fields.description: Depth at which the recorder was deployed. Expressed in meters. Not to be combined with `recorderHeight`.

fields.name: recorderTilt
fields.description: Angle at which the recorder was deployed in the vertical plane. Expressed in degrees, with `-90` facing down, `0` horizontal and `90` facing up.

fields.name: recorderHeading
fields.description: Angle at which the recorder was deployed in the horizontal plane. Expressed in decimal degrees clockwise from north, with values ranging from `0` to `360`: `0` = north, `90` = east, `180` = south, `270` = west.

fields.name: timestampIssues
fields.description: `true` if timestamps in the `media` resource for the deployment are known to have (unsolvable) issues (e.g. unknown timezone, am/pm switch).

fields.name: baitUse
fields.description: `true` if bait was used for the deployment. More information can be provided in `tags` or `comments`.

fields.name: featureType
fields.description: Type of the feature (if any) associated with the deployment.

fields.name: habitat
fields.description: Brief description of the habitat at the deployment location.

fields.name: deploymentGroups
fields.description: Deployment group(s) associated with the deployment. Deployment groups can have a spatial (arrays, grids, clusters), temporal (sessions, seasons, months, years) or other context. Formatted as a pipe (`|`) separated list for multiple values, with values preferably formatted as `key:value` pairs.

fields.name: deploymentTags
fields.description: Tag(s) associated with the deployment. Formatted as a pipe (`|`) separated list for multiple values, with values optionally formatted as `key:value` pairs.

fields.name: deploymentComments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the deployment.
